home.title: Welcome
home.heading: HI, I AM
home.introduction: As a Software Engineer, I specialize in building modern, scalable, and performance-focused web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
home.introduction_2: With a solid foundation in SQL programming and database design, I develop robust systems that integrate clean architecture and deliver a seamless user experience from frontend to backend.
home.core_competencies_1: Frontend Engineering (Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, SCSS, Responsive Design)
home.core_competencies_2: Backend API Design & Integration (REST, Authentication, Authorization)
home.core_competencies_4: Clean Code, Scalable Architecture, and Agile Collaboration
home.content_in_mail: I want to contact to you
home.portfolio_content: Here are some of the selected projects that showcase my passion for front-end development.
home.podcast_page_description: Welcome to the Podcast page, where you can explore engaging stories, useful insights, and inspiring conversations every day.
home.portfolio_page_description: Showcasing my projects, skills, and achievements in a clean and professional portfolio. Explore my work and see what I can create.
home.banking_page_description: A modern and secure banking platform that helps users manage transactions, savings, and financial insights with ease. Designed for convenience, transparency, and complete control over your money.

about.short_description: I am a web developer skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, with strong UI design abilities using Figma and TailwindCSS. I have hands-on experience building applications with Node.js, React, and working with SQL databases. My goal is to create optimized, scalable, and cleanly structured products.

go_fiber.responsibility_1: Developed core business logic and system functionalities using NestJS and TypeScript.
go_fiber.responsibility_2: Conducted functional testing and fixed bugs to ensure system stability and reliability

tri_thuc.responsibility_1: Created user registration forms and validated input data before inserting into the database
tri_thuc.responsibility_2: Handled server-side logic to ensure smooth data processing and workflow
tri_thuc.responsibility_3: Provided structural guidance and direction to other team members involved in the project

webs_portfolio.title: MY WORKS
webs_portfolio.short_description: I focus on building stable, scalable products that deliver a smooth and meaningful user experience. Throughout my work, I have developed various projects, ranging from web interfaces to server-side logic and database design.
